name: Conveyor (ew.benji)
description:
Heyooo 😎

Conveyor is an  Indie game made by students of IPLeiria.

Please do give feedback (or just comment a random emoji and we will be thankful either way :))) ).

________________________________________________________________________________________

We used wintonson's sprites for GB Studio for the player model. Here is the link to their project's page in Itch.io:

https://wintonson.itch.io/gb-studio-sprites
